code: export function GetAllCustomersOfCompanies(company){return{type:"GET_ALL_CUSTOMERS_OF_COMPANIES",paylod:company};}export function GetAllCustomersByCompany(company){return{type:"GET_ALL_CUSTOMERS_BY_COMPANY",paylod:company};}export function GetCustomerByCode(company){return{type:"GET_CUSTOMER_BY_CODE",paylod:company};}export function AddCustomer(company){return{type:"ADD_CUSTOMER",paylod:company};}export function UpdateCustomer(company){return{type:"UPDATE_CUSTOMER",paylod:company};}export function RemoveCustomer(company){return{type:"REMOVE_CUSTOMER",paylod:company};}
